data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Wealth First Portfolio Managers Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from September 30 2025 the equity shares of Wealth First Portfolio Managers Ltd (Scrip Code: 544536) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250929-75 dated September 29 2025.
